H0.text: What type of fish is used in the production of Worcestershire sauce. Anchovy

H1.text: What type of fish is used in the production of Worcestershire sauce. Herring

H2.text: What type of fish is used in the production of Worcestershire sauce. Mackerel

H3.text: What type of fish is used in the production of Worcestershire sauce. Chovy

A4.text: Anchovy is an ingredient in Worcestershire sauce.
